channel.title: React on Arian's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in React on Arian's Portfolio

item.title: Module Bundling and Webpack in Simple Terms
item.description: #chapter-1, #chapter-2__scroll { display: none; position: relative; height: 100vh; width: 100%; } .chapter-1__heading { font-size: 2rem; margin-bottom: 0; margin-top: 0; max-width: none !important; position: absolute; text-align: center; width: 100%; } .chapter-1__heading-1 { opacity: 1; } .chapter-1__hider-1, .chapter-1__hider-2, .chapter-1__hider-3, .chapter-1__hider-4 { background-color: #002B36; height: 1rem; position: absolute; width: 100%; } .chapter-2__darkener { background-color: gray; opacity: 0.5; position: absolute; height: 30rem; width: 100%; } .chapter-2__code-file { position: absolute; width: 100%; } .
